Bloodborne Core Gameplay Element Analysis


This is a game design document I wrote as part of an application. It analyses the boss fight against Lady Maria and discusses approaches to balancing as well as overall game feel. As such it also describes this fight's benefits and drawbacks in the context of Bloodborne's overall design.
